title: Discovery & Foundation
description: What you get: assessment, stakeholder interviews, and workflow mapping. Typical timeline: 1–2 weeks. Decision enabled: confirm priority workflows and whether a Proof-of-Concept is worth running.

title: Proof-of-Concept
description: What you get: 1–2 real workflows modeled in a safe, non-production environment with clear success criteria. Typical timeline: 2–4 weeks. Decision enabled: whether to scale and which workflows to expand.

title: Scale & Ongoing
description: What you get: expansion to additional workflows, governance and HITL tuning, and operating model support. Typical timeline: monthly cycles. Decision enabled: when to standardize and operationalize across teams.
